name: Boston Coffee Mug
description: An elegant design coffee mug; 304 food-grade stainless steel and double-walled vacuum insulated, electrolysis interior, keeps your coffee hot and soft drink cold. 330 ml capacity, splashproof plastic pressure lid with push-seal closure. BPA free and handwashing is recommended.
